Description:
Wow - Nothing to do - Just move in
With modern updates added to this property over the past few years, all whom inspect will be impressed with the interior renovations and general appearance of this home. This home consists of
three bedrooms with BIR's (Bay window in Master), open plan lounge meals area, spacious family room with easy access to the outside undercover entertaining area. The Kitchen has been updated with s/s cooking appliances, dishwasher and new laminate bench tops. The bathroom is spacious in size, including bath, separate shower and vanity unit. The home consists of a two car lockable carport with roller doors as well as a spacious steel garage with room for cars and workshop. An additional feature is the movable bungalow which is currently being used as a teenagers retreat/bedroom. The property backs on to a large parkland reserve, giving the kids plenty of room to run and play. Located with close proximity to public transport, Newcomb Central, local schools and Newcomb Secondary College. This home is very neat and tidy with minimal gardening required and would be perfect for a developing family through to property investors.
Call David Phillips on 0448 441 669 to arrange your private inspection.
David Phillips : 0448 441 669

Description:
Neat & Tidy, True Value for Money!
In a quiet, convenient location this exceptional 4 bedroom brick home represents outstanding value for money. It's easy access to shopping centres, primary/secondary schools and public transport. This tidy home boasts a spacious L-shape light filled living, modern kitchen/dining which leads to outside entertaining area, 3 bedrooms all with BIR's (master with ensuite), 4th bedroom/study and central laundry. Extras include; ducted heating, DLUG with ample storage space and low maintenance gardens all on a great 800sqm(approx) allotment. Perfect family home or investment for the astute purchaser.

Description:
Value for money!
This home is located just minutes form the CBD and is walking distance to schools and local shops. Boasting 3 bedrooms, main living with wood fire and gas heating, kitchen, meals, two way bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Outside is a fantastic yard with undercover carport, garden shed, DLUG and a pergola, perfect for entertaining, all is situated behind a private front fence and secure gates, perfect for pets and kids! There are some great established trees in the backyard which are fantastic for privacy. Most of the windows also have outdoor roller shutters that are manually adjusted from the inside perfect for keeping the heat out in summer and warmth in winter. Block size is approx 570sqm. I have clear instructions from my vendor that this property must be sold!

Description:
Hurry Up, Or You'll Miss Out!
First to see, will buy! Situated in a very quiet location in arguably the "Best Pocket" of Whittington, here lays an opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. Ideal for 1sthome buyers& investors, with an anticipated rental return of approx.$230-$250p/w. Well maintained weatherboard home, on a separate title and being 1of only 2 on the block. The property features 3 generous sized bedrooms, study area, open plan lounge/kitchen/meals area complimented by PFB's & air-conditioning. The fresh bathroom & laundry complete the internal rooms of the home. Once outdoors, private and secure front & rear yards await, allowing plenty of room for the children and even for the pets as well. The spacious carport easily doubles up as the undercover entertaining area, which is certainly a bonus. There is even a garden shed. Simply just move the furniture in & enjoy. Close to all facilities, amenities, all forms of Education, sporting grounds, 2 x major shopping centers and public transport. Less than 5mins to Geelong's CBD, The Botanical Gardens & the ever popular Waterfront. Call John Pigott on Mobile: 0407 857606 and book your inspection now, but at this price don't wait too long!

Great Starter or Solid Investment
This immaculate unit is one of only two on the block and shares no common ground at all. Featuring 2 large bedrooms (both with BIR and main with S/S) a large lounge with separate kitchen & dining area, central bathroom, separate laundry & toilet, gas heating and single lock up garage with security access through the rear. Having been re-painted inside, a new rear fence, new carpet in the living & dining areas plus new floor coverings in the kitchen you won't find a better opportunity to enter the property market or to start that investment portfolio. Approx rental return of $250pw.

Description:
The Perfect Start, But Be Quick!
Situated in a very quiet court location here lays an opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. Simply ideal for the first home buyer (take advantage 1st home buyers Government grant), or you could even start/add to your investment portfolio, as rental demands are very strong in this area (currently rented @ $250p/w until December '10). Featuring 3 generous sized bedrooms, spacious lounge complimented by a gas wall furnace and A/C, walking through to the fully appointed kitchen, which adjoins the meals area. Separate bathroom & laundry complete the internal features of the home. Once outdoors a pergola area awaits, which is ideal for entertaining and a good sized rear yard making it ideal for the children. There is plenty of space for the cars, with a large garage/shed (approx. 9mts x 6mts) at the rear of the property, as well as a carport plus drive way space as well. Double gates provide security for the Boat/Caravan/Trailer. Close to all facilities, amenities, schooling, sporting grounds and public transport this is surely to have its admirers and is a must see inspection. All on an approx. allotment of 697m2, the opportunities are endless, but at this price don't wait too long! Call John Pigott on Mobile: 0407 857606 and book your inspection now!

Description:
First To See Will Buy
Situated on the fringe of the ever popular suburb of St. Albans Park, here lays an opportunity for the astute purchaser with a keen eye for value. A perfect chance to secure a property in a great location, as this property is simply ideal for the first home buyer (take advantage 1st home buyers Government grant), those looking to downsize, or you could even start/add to your investment portfolio, as rental demands are very strong in this area. Nestled amongst a group of similar T/Houses this beautifully presented property is sure to be in high demand and it simply won't last long! Featuring 2 generous sized bedrooms, both with BIR's, spacious lounge with ceiling fan walking through to the functional kitchen which provides plenty of bench & cupboard space & adjoins the tiled meals area. Separate bathroom & laundry complete the internal features of the home. Once outdoors a North facing outdoor area awaits, which is ideal for entertaining and has good space making it ideal for a small pet. The outdoor area adjoins the low maintenance garden which looks great and is very easy to maintain. Car accommodation is taken care of with a SLUG, complimented by internal access for additional security. Close to all facilities, amenities, schooling, sporting grounds and public transport at your doorstep, this is surely to have its admirers and is a must see inspection. All this situated on a "Smart Block" allotment, the opportunities are endless, but at this price don't wait too long! Call John Pigott on Mobile: 0407 857606 and book your inspection now!

Description:
Be Quick, or Miss Out!
The heading says it all! If you have been looking to enter the property market or wanting to start or add to your investment portfolio, this property is a must see for your list. Take advantage of the Governments' First Home Owners Grant and secure this well maintained property. For the astute investor, a perfect opportunity to either start or add to your investment portfolio, with strong rental demands in this area. This well maintained Brick Veneer property certainly has a lot to offer. Features 3 generous sized Bedrooms, spacious Lounge with gas heating, fully appointed functional Kitchen including a Dishwasher, separate Meals area which has glass sliding doors leading to an outdoor entertaining area which is private and easy to maintain. The Bathroom & Laundry are both of good size. There is also the added advantage of a second shower room. There is also a split system heating & cooling unit in the meals area. The generous sized rear yard is complimented by a DLUG accessible through double gates and a garden shed, still leaving plenty of room for the children to amuse themselves. Car accommodation is taken care of with a double lock up garage and the advantage of an additional single carport + car space to the front of the property. Close to facilities, amenities, all forms of education, shopping centres and public transport at your doorstep. All this on an approx.687m2 allotment, means that you must act quickly to be the lucky purchaser. Call John Pigott now on Mobile:0407 857 606 and book in your inspection!

Description:
Spacious family living!
Set on approx 700sqm this stunning family home has just been extended and has plenty of space for the growing family. Featuring 4 double bedrooms, master with bay window, en-suite and WIR, while all other bedrooms include BIRs. Formal lounge is at the front of the home away from the rest of the living area. Down the hall is where the home comes into its element featuring open-plan kitchen/meals area overlooking the massive family room, which opens out to the undercover pergola entertaining area. Outside you are welcomed by a pool, work shed with power, double garage and plenty of yard. Extras include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ceiling fans throughout the home. This is great family living at an affordable price.

Description:
Great investment opportunity
This superb rear unit offers outstanding low maintenance living for the first home buyers, those looking to downsize or to invest. Accommodation includes two bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living room with gas wall furnace, kitchen overlooking meals area, central bathroom plus a single lock up garage. Conveniently positioned close to all amenities, this property presents a great investment opportunity. Be quick to inspect!

Description:
Smart block and ready to be built on!
On the fringe of St. Albans Park. Ideal opportunity to secure a fully serviced "Smart Block "allotment of approx. 418m2 in a great little pocket with outstanding potential. Take advantage of Governments "1st Home Owners Grant" of $29,500 and build a great property which would be surrounded by well established homes all of which are less than 3 yrs old. The block is fully fenced, and the front timber fence even has c/bond double gates installed. There is simply nothing left to do. Your builder could start building tomorrow! This block is sure to be in high demand. Close to all facilities, amenities, major shopping centers, all forms of education, sporting grounds &less than 5 mins from Geelong's CBD

Description:
Developer? Renovator? 1st Home Buyer?
If you have been looking for a property with outstanding development potential, then stop, look no further, you've found it! Situated on the fringe of St. Albans Park, this is an Ideal opportunity to secure a corner allotment of approx. 1007m2, in a great little pocket with outstanding potential. Add your own special touch to the current weather board home of good size which features 3 Br's, spacious lounge, functional kitchen & separate meals area. There is also a study area as well, which is an added bonus. Once outdoors there is plenty of yard space which is complimented by a large shed, ideal for those who would like to run a business from home, or for the mechanic who likes working on cars, or for those who simply want a large shed for storage. The opportunities are simply endless. The decision can then be made whether to renovate, sub-divide or totally re-develop. With the possibility of 4 townhouses to be erected (STCA) this property is sure to be in high demand. Close to all facilities, amenities, major shopping centers, all forms of education, sporting grounds & less than 5 mins from Geelong's CBD. Terms are 10% deposit and balance in 60 days or earlier by mutual agreement.
